text: Cibo Matto is an American rock band formed in New York City in 1994. == Influences == Cibo Matto stated music artists like Yoko Ono, Lenny Kravitz, Ben Harper, The Specials, Danny Jones, Billy Squier, Alex Orbison, Living Colour, 311, Tina Bell, TLC, Total, Poison, Better Than Ezra, Saliva, Lisa Marie Presley, Good Charlotte, Del Amitri, Shubbhenda Shanker, Counting Crows, Rosanne Cash, Penny Ford, The Wallflowers, Lalah Hathaway, The Police and Reckless Kelly as influences. == Members == * Miho Hatori - lead vocals, guitars (1994-2017) * Yuka Honda - keyboards, backing vocals (1994-2017) * Sean Lennon - bass, backing vocals (1994-2017) * Timo Elis - drums (1994-2017) == Discography == == References == == Other websites == * Cibo Matto official website (archive) Category:American alternative rock bands Category:American hip hop bands Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2017 Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:Musical groups from New York City Category:Trip hop groups Category:Warner Bros. Records artists
title: Cibo Matto
